name: Timber (RyMac992)
description:
Timber is a 3rd person action/collection game in which the player takes control of a lumberjack named Jack. Along with the help from a flying squirrel, the player must defeat beavers and chop down trees to collect wood as they traverse up a mountain to get back home. It is an action game in the style of vintage Nintendo 64 games like Mario 64 and Banjo Kazooie.

Team:

Ryan McAllister

Keanu Kia

Kevin Hand

Wyatt Shumate

Jared Bittner

Nathan Samoranski

Christopher Burst

Melissa Almirall
